trans-unit.source: Provides validation of a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator> is used to ensure a <xref:System.TimeSpan> object meets specific criteria.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator>用來確保<xref:System.TimeSpan>物件符合特定準則。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.CanValidate%2A> method determines whether the object type being validated matches the expected type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.CanValidate%2A>方法會判斷要驗證的物件型別是否符合預期的類型。

trans-unit.source: The object being validated is passed as a parameter of the <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 正在驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的<xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To pass validation, the object being validated must be a positive <xref:System.TimeSpan> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要通過驗證時，正在驗證的物件必須是正<xref:System.TimeSpan>值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator> type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator>型別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator" /> class.
The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator>類別。

trans-unit.source: The object type.
Determines whether the object type can be validated.
<see langword="true" /> if the <paramref name="type" /> parameter matches a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> object; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.CanValidate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.CanValidate%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator>類別。

trans-unit.source: The value of an object.
Determines whether the value of an object is valid.
The object to validate is passed as a parameter of the <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的物件會傳遞做為參數的<xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: To pass validation, the object being validated must be a positive <xref:System.TimeSpan> value.
trans-unit.target: 若要通過驗證時，正在驗證的物件必須是正<xref:System.TimeSpan>值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use the <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會示範如何使用 <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator.Validate%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分<xref:System.Configuration.PositiveTimeSpanValidator>類別。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="value" /> cannot be resolved as a positive <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value.
